languages.text: "А Инквизитор не считает, что и сам он опасно склонился к чему-то не слегка вменяемому? Как можно дозволять подобное?! Как можно спокойно взирать на эти расправы и считать, что все идет как следует?!"

"Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"
languages.original_text: "А Инквизитор не считает, что и сам он опасно склонился к чему-то не слегка вменяемому? Как можно дозволять подобное?! Как можно спокойно взирать на эти расправы и считать, что все идет как следует?!"

traits.locale_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"

traits.locale_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"

traits.locale_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “审判者到底有没有怀疑过，说不定他本人陷入了某种危险的疯狂之中？他怎么能容忍发生这样的事情？怎么能有人心平气和地看待这些暴行，还认为一切都在井然有序地进行？”
languages.original_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"

traits.locale_text: “审判者到底有没有怀疑过，说不定他本人陷入了某种危险的疯狂之中？他怎么能容忍发生这样的事情？怎么能有人心平气和地看待这些暴行，还认为一切都在井然有序地进行？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「異端審問官は、ちょっとだけ狂った出来事に、危険なくらい近付いてしまった事はない？こんなことが許されて良いと思うの？この残虐行為を落ち着いて見つめて、万事こうであるべきだと、言い切れる者はいるのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問官は、ちょっとだけ狂った出来事に、危険なくらい近付いてしまった事はない？こんなことが許されて良いと思うの？この残虐行為を落ち着いて見つめて、万事こうであるべきだと、言い切れる者はいるのかしら？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿No se le ha pasado por la cabeza al inquisidor que él también está cometiendo actos demenciales? ¿Cómo puede tolerarse algo así? ¿Cómo puede alguien contemplar estas atrocidades y pensar que todo va bien?».
languages.original_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No se le ha pasado por la cabeza al inquisidor que él también está cometiendo actos demenciales? ¿Cómo puede tolerarse algo así? ¿Cómo puede alguien contemplar estas atrocidades y pensar que todo va bien?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ist dem Inquisitor vielleicht in den Sinn gekommen, dass auch er gefährlich nah an etwas geringfügig Wahnsinniges herantänzelt? Wie kann so etwas geduldet werden? Wie kann man diese Gräueltaten ruhig mitansehen und glauben, dass alles so seine Richtigkeit hat?"
languages.original_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"

traits.locale_text: "Ist dem Inquisitor vielleicht in den Sinn gekommen, dass auch er gefährlich nah an etwas geringfügig Wahnsinniges herantänzelt? Wie kann so etwas geduldet werden? Wie kann man diese Gräueltaten ruhig mitansehen und glauben, dass alles so seine Richtigkeit hat?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « L'inquisiteur n'a pas remarqué qu'il est dangereusement proche de la folie, lui aussi ? Comment est-ce qu'on peut tolérer une chose pareille ? Comment est-ce qu'on peut garder son calme en assistant à ce genre d'atrocités et affirmer que tout va bien ? »
languages.original_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"

traits.locale_text: « L'inquisiteur n'a pas remarqué qu'il est dangereusement proche de la folie, lui aussi ? Comment est-ce qu'on peut tolérer une chose pareille ? Comment est-ce qu'on peut garder son calme en assistant à ce genre d'atrocités et affirmer que tout va bien ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Engizisyoncu'nun aklına belki de kendisinin de hafiften delice bir şeylere tehlikeli derecede yaklaştığı ihtimali gelmiş olabilir mi? Böyle bir şey nasıl tolere edilebilir? Bir insan, bu zulme sakin sakin bakıp her şeyin olması gerektiği gibi olduğunu nasıl düşünebilir?"
languages.original_text: "Has it by any chance occurred to the Inquisitor that he, too, is getting dangerously close to something slightly insane? How can a thing like this be tolerated? How can anyone look calmly upon these atrocities and think everything's going as it should?"

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyoncu'nun aklına belki de kendisinin de hafiften delice bir şeylere tehlikeli derecede yaklaştığı ihtimali gelmiş olabilir mi? Böyle bir şey nasıl tolere edilebilir? Bir insan bu zulme sakin sakin bakıp, her şeyin olması gerektiği gibi olduğunu nasıl düşünebilir?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
